appointmentDateWarning: Appointment Date should not be in past
selectReasonForTerminateTheTreatment: Select reason for terminate the treatment
areYouSure-aware: Please confirm to change aware status to yes.
markAsPaidConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to mark cycle {0} as paid
previousCycleRecieptPaid: Please ensure that previous cycles receipt has been paid and uploaded
pleaseConfirmDataConfirmDate: Please confirm {0} is correct data consent date
pleaseConfirmInitiationDate: Please confirm {0} is correct treatment initiation date
identifiedMeaning: This label denotes a patient who has been referred to Mango PSE and has interacted with Mango PSE.
awareMeaning: This label denotes a patient who has  had the first interaction with Mango CRM and who has shared his/her details with Mango CRM (e.g., queries, feedback, decision to enrol, date of next appointment, etc.). The "Aware" flag in the Mango CRM login is enabled with this status.
engagedMeaning: This label denotes a patient who has registered onto the Mango app/portal.
appliedMeaning: This label denotes a patient who has submitted the PBP application.(In case a patient chooses self pay, this label will denotes completion of all steps with submission of documents; In case a patient chooses financial assistance, this label will be activated once the application has been submitted after document upload by all applicants.
approvedMeaning: This label denotes a patient whose application for financial assistance has been approved.
rejectedMeaning: This label denotes a patient whose application for financial assistance has been rejected.
enrolledMeaning: This label denotes a patient who is enrolled onto the PBP and whose treating oncologist has entered the treatment start date.
completedMeaning: This label denotes a patient who has submitted the final feedback form after completion of last cycle.
clinicalDropOutMeaning: This label denotes a patient whose treating oncologist has decided to end the treatment program for a clinical reason.
nonClinicalDropOut: This label denotes a patient whose treating oncologist has decided to end the treatment program for a non-clinical reason.
rebateInitiationDateMeaning: This label denotes the date at which the trasnfer for the applicable rebate amout was initiated by Mango Cancer Care Foundation.
modeOfPaymentMeaning: This label denotes the choice of payment (self-pay vs financial assistance) mode that the patient has selected to fund care during the PBP
assignLenderConfirm: Are you sure you want to assign to {0}.
confirmRebatePaid: Please confirm to mark rebate amount as paid.
totalCostIncured: Total cumulative cost incurred by patient
